p: Overall, the epidemic behaviour in FSA was in sharp contrast with trends observed in notified cases across Brazil (BR) as a whole, for which the second epidemic in 2016 was approximately 6 times larger than the one in 2015 ( Figure 1A), suggesting the Bahia state as a focus point in the emergence and initial spread of ZIKV in Brazil ( Faria et al., 2016c; Faria et al., 2016a). Nonetheless, a clear temporal synchronization between country level and FSA case counts could be observed.
